body: @nhcasual Hell yeah! Thanks in advance for translating his other works too!

@nhcasual, thanks for this series, you planning to do anymore of this genres ones? like roshutsu shoujo nikki series? like 112074
Thanks for the TL. Been a fan of this genre and this is one of my fav

And to think this all started cause she found some Exhibitionism porn on the hubbies comp so she decided to instead of doing it with him she should start "learning" it on her own before giving him a big surprise and it just went down hill from there.

Hope it won't reach another 10 chapters for that
